Pudding is a super cute brunch and dessert restaurant. The interior of Pudding has giant mushrooms stretching through two floors! It's like Alice in Wonderland like many people have mentioned.Their carrot cake is reputed to be one of the best in the city. I'll have to try that next time! I ordered white tea and red velvet cake. While both are delicious, I did not find them exceeding my expectations. That being said, I still love the look and feel of the restaurant and will stop by in the future for their brunch and carrot cake!
